ors.name: Oral Rehydration Solution (ORS)
ors.composition: ORS is a balanced mixture of electrolytes and glucose to aid rehydration. Composition per litre shown in ingredients above.
ors.preparation: Mix the contents of one ORS packet with exactly 1 litre of clean drinking water. Stir until dissolved. Use immediately (discard after 24 hours).
side_effects: Rare: electrolyte imbalance if improperly prepared
ors.notes: This entry is a demo for transparency; always follow manufacturer instructions.
